title: Maghalie Rochette Completes USCX Sweep at Really Rad Festival of Cyclocross; Curtis White Snags 2 Wins to Take Series Win
content:
The final weekend of the North American cyclocross series saw two sweeps as the top riders prepare for the European calendar.Â
